Be of good courage in the Lord. He has wrought for you in the past, and He will continue to prepare the way before you. I cannot but feel assured that you have found the very place [Berrien Springs] in which to begin your school work.--Letter 89, 1901, p. 1. (To P. T. Magan and E. A. Sutherland, July 21, 1901.) 

Released May 20, 1977.
